DDE (data dynamic exchange)non-DDE application programming interface

body.p: provides an application programming interface (API) that enables an application to directly communicate with the functions without running. However, it is required that is installed, all drives are configured, and shared resources are connected. The application can communicate with all functions currently covered by the dynamic data exchange (DDE) interface (that is, the OTMBATCH command area). In addition, it can use all functions concerning dictionary and handling, namely retrieving dictionary and proposals and updating dictionaries and .
